table.caption: Datasets used in LI projects focused on European (PT) and Brazilian (BR) Portuguese.

rows.Project Name: Identification of Document Language is not yet a completely solved problem~\cite{4052828}
rows.Author: Joaquim Ferreira da Silva
rows.PT Dataset: Eurolex News from Publico Diário de Notícias Newspaper
rows.BR Dataset: Legal Documents from the General Secretariat of Brazilian Republic Presidency

rows.Project Name: Automatic Identification of Language Varieties: The Case of Portuguese~\cite{zampieri2012automatic}
rows.Author: Marcos Zampieri
rows.BR Dataset: News from Folha de São Paulo

rows.Project Name: Smoothed n-gram based models for tweet language identification: A case study of the Brazilian and European Portuguese national varieties~\cite{CASTRO20171160}
rows.Author: Dayvid W. Castro
rows.PT Dataset: Portuguese Tweets published with a Portuguese IP address
rows.BR Dataset: Portuguese Tweets published with a Brazilian IP address
